contact: D.M. Malaspina @ U. Colorado at Boulder, LASP

parameters.name: Ch01___cc_threshold
parameters.description: Threshold value allowed for cross-correlation on Ch 1

parameters.name: MinCh1_threshold
parameters.description: Event selection threshold amplitude (mV) on Ch 1

parameters.name: Ch1ImpAnt_E_S_Angle
parameters.description: Avg. clockwise angle (degrees) of closest Ex antenna (to dust impact on spacecraft bus) from Earth-sun line (i.e., roughly +X-GSE)

parameters.name: Ch02___cc_threshold
parameters.description: Threshold value allowed for cross-correlation on Ch 2

parameters.name: MinCh2_threshold
parameters.description: Event selection threshold amplitude (mV) on Ch 2

parameters.name: Ch2ImpAnt_E_S_Angle
parameters.description: Avg. clockwise angle (degrees) of closest Ey antenna (to dust impact on spacecraft bus) from Earth-sun line (i.e., roughly +X-GSE)

parameters.name: Pos_Ax_SCS_Angle
parameters.description: Avg. clockwise angle (degrees) of +Ex antenna from spacecraft-sun line

parameters.name: Pos_Ax_E_S_Angle
parameters.description: Avg. clockwise angle (degrees) of +Ex antenna from Earth-sun line (i.e., roughly +X-GSE)

parameters.name: Pos_Ay_E_S_Angle
parameters.description: Avg. clockwise angle (degrees) of +Ey antenna from Earth-sun line (i.e., roughly +X-GSE)
